attributes.action: keep St Johns school, grimshaw lane, Bollington as the best option for the Church of England primary school in Bollington.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Cheshire county council have proposed closure of one of the church of England schools in Bollington.
St Johns School offers a fantastic location, off the busy main road accessible by foot by 70%of the population of Bollington (within 1Km)
Please sign this petition to demonstrate your support for St Johns.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "keep St Johns school, grimshaw lane, Bollington as the best option for the Church of England primary school in Bollington."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page14179.asp

Prime Minister's Office
